article_title: Obamacare crumbling: Two more cracks in bad law
article_text:
Editorials

This week's report from the State Department Office of Inspector General will make it harder for apologists to explain away the Clinton email fiasco, but they'll keep trying.

Katie Couric did not so much destroy her reputation as a journalist, as confirm it.

When is the governor of New Hampshire not the governor? When she’s not in New Hampshire.

article_metadata.description: Last week, a federal judge ruled the Obama administration was indeed usurping Congress's power of the purse by paying health insurance companies under a provision of the Affordable Care Act that Congress refused to fund.
article_metadata.title: Obamacare crumbling: Two more cracks in bad law | New Hampshire
